home.title: Hello, my name is Maxime Leclerc
home.introduction: I am a full stack web developer

introduction.part1: Passionate about the web for many years, I started to acquire skills in this area through my formation. Obtaining my professional ATC Webmaster license has given me a solid foundation for designing a website.
introduction.part2: I was able to deepen this knowledge by my professional experience but also by exercising in my free time a constant watch on the technologies and languages ​​of tomorrow. I practice today for more than 5 years the job of web developer.

experiences.hightSchool: Scientific BAC sciences of engineer and european english specialties
experiences.dut: University degree in computer sciences software engineering specialty
experiences.licence: Professionnal licence in web development / webmaster

skills.title: Skills
skills.introduction: From the development of features to the design of a dynamic and intuitive customer interface, my skills allow me to create a tailor-made website.

contact.title: Contact
contact.introduction: Feel free to contact me via this form for all requests, I would be happy to answer you as soon as possible. You can also contact me on my social networks or with the email address below.
